comment.author: 43107566@N08
comment._content:
Hi,

this is not Stuttgart; it is Heidelberg Castle, the Torturm (gate tower), built in 1531/34.

Best regards,
Stefan

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Hi Stefan, 
You made this interesting picture complete and enhanced its value giving us the correct context. We have now corrected our information both here on Flickr Commons and in our photo database. Thanks a lot!

Best regards,
Anna B.
